verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Is there <S%H5750>yet<s%> any that is <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> that I may <S%H6213>show<s%> him <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for <S%H3129>Jonathan's<s%> <S%H5668>sake?<s%>

And there was of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6717>Ziba.<s%> And when they had <S%H7121>called<s%> him to <S%H1732>David,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Are you <S%H6717>Ziba?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> is he.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Is there not <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> that I may <S%H6213>show<s%> the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to him? And <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> has <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> which is <S%H5223>lame<s%> on his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H375>Where<s%> is he? And <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> he is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel,<s%> in <S%H3810>Lodebar.<s%>

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> him out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel,<s%> from <S%H3810>Lodebar.<s%>

Now when <S%H4648>Mephibosheth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> he <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and did <S%H7812>reverence.<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4648>Mephibosheth.<s%> And he <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> your <S%H5650>servant!<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not: for I will <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H6213>show<s%> you <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H5668>sake,<s%> and will <S%H7725>restore<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7704>land<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> your <S%H1>father;<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> my <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
And he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that you should <S%H6437>look<s%> on such a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H3611>dog<s%> as I am?

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H6717>Ziba,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H5288>servant,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H1961>pertained<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

You therefore, and your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> shall <S%H5647>till<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> for him, and you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in the fruits, that your <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> may <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> to <S%H398>eat:<s%> but <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> your <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H8548>always<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> my <S%H7979>table.<s%> Now <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> had <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> According to <S%H3605>all<s%> that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6213>do.<s%> As for <S%H4648>Mephibosheth,<s%> said the <S%H4428>king,<s%> he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> my <S%H7979>table,<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> had a <S%H6996>young<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4316>Micha.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H4186>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> were <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H4648>Mephibosheth.<s%>

So <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> for he did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H7979>table;<s%> and was <S%H6455>lame<s%> on <S%H8147>both<s%> his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
